channel.title: Hugo on tehblog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on tehblog

item.title: Hugo Migration
item.description: I don’t know if this is better but it works just took a bit to migrate it. I had lost all the posts and I was new to hugo. There is supposed to be disqus support but I couldn’t get it working. I’ve changed my mind on the disqus thing. More like accepted it. A lot of blogs use it and implementing anything else on this theme right now would be too hard.
